channel.title: How do i make my autospawn.cfg hold more npc's?
channel.description: how do i make my autospawn.cfg hold more npc's? i currently get a error when running my server cause of too many npc's in my autospawn.

item.title: How do i make my autospawn.cfg hold more npc's?
item.dc:creator: @rangergodlv rangergodlv
item.description:
@rangergodlv wrote:

nope, i tryed to just now cause i thought that would fix the error, cause i thought if i cut the autospawn.cfg into two .cfg’s itd fix it, but it didnt, and its not cause of the spaces cause i used tab.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make my autospawn.cfg hold more npc's?

item.title: How do i make my autospawn.cfg hold more npc's?
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

rangergodlv:

thats the thing though, if i cut my npc list in half (4,200) npc’s spawned, into about 2,100, the server will load fine, i just tryed adding a secound “autospawn.cfg” and i added it right but if i go over 2,100 npc’s i get that error, and i went into my npchandler.java and changed the max spawned npc’s and everingthing to a really high number and compiled it and still gives me that error.

Wait, back up, your saying you made a NEW autospawn.cfg? you can’t do that.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make my autospawn.cfg hold more npc's?
item.dc:creator: @rangergodlv rangergodlv
item.description:
@rangergodlv wrote:

im not using [pi] , and the error is,

Loaded WorldMap In (250 ms)... Your server is now online. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 19687 at NPCHandler.newNPC(NPCHandler.java:2222) at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:1988) at NPCHandler.(NPCHandler.java:550) at server.main(server.java:167)

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make my autospawn.cfg hold more npc's?
item.dc:creator: @purestmage74 purestmage74
item.description:
@purestmage74 wrote:

Find this:

	public static NPC npcs[] = new NPC[maxNPCs];
	public static int maxNPCs = 10000;
	public static NPCList NpcList[] = new NPCList[maxListedNPCs];
	public static int maxListedNPCs = 10000;

Im using a [pi] so its in the directory “src/server/model/npcs/”

Read full topic
